nodes.bodyText: The parser is now just called css, in case you want to change it

No joy simply changing it:
Execution failed for task ':spotlessStyling'.
> Unexpected response status code at /prettier/format [HTTP 501] -- (Error while formatting: TypeError: text.trimEnd is not a function)

Ah, it's this error again. It seems like the newer 'prettier' requires a newer version of NodeJS, which introduces a String.trimEnd function.
But nevermind then
